bug.question: I have wings and like to buzz. I make something sweet that you love to put in your tea. What am I?
I crawl on the ground and carry food. I work with all my friends in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and fly around. People say I'm lucky if I land on you. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat aphids on plants.
🔴 I am a small, round beetle.

bug.question: I jump very high and am green in color. I make a chirping sound, especially in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy fields.
🎶 I make a sound with my legs.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not four. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Little Miss Muffet was afraid of me.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then make a cocoon. After that, I fly with colorful wings. What am I?
I live in the ground, but I'm not a worm. I make a loud noise in the summer heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 Only the males make the noise.
🎵 Some people think my song is annoying.

bug.question: I have a long body with lots of legs. I crawl in dark places and can scare you with my wiggly ways. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have many legs, but not one hundred.
🪵 I live under rocks and logs.

bug.question: I glow in the dark on summer nights. I am a beetle, but I light the way. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 My light helps me find a mate.

bug.question: I fly around and eat mosquitoes. I have large eyes and iridescent wings. What am I?

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You can find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and lots of fish swim in me. What am I?
I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have lots of arms to help me grab things.

ocean.question: I am a home made of shells and sand in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of hard material.

ocean.question: I am a very large sea animal, and I sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm the biggest animal on Earth!
🌬️ I breathe air through a hole on my back.

ocean.question: I have a star shape and live at the bottom of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I can grow a new arm if I lose one.
🦀 Some crabs like to eat me!

ocean.question: I have a pouch where I carry my babies, and I swim upright. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I look a little like a horse.
🐠 I am a type of fish.
🌊 I live in warm ocean waters.

ocean.question: I am a very old turtle who lives in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌏 I swim very far across the ocean.

ocean.question: I float on top of the ocean and boats use me to know where to go. What am I?
I am a heavy object connected to a boat by a rope or chain, used to keep the boat in place. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I am dropped to the bottom of the ocean.
⛓️ I am used to keep a boat from floating away.
🌊 I hold the boat steady in the ocean.
